My blog

INDIA

Comming Soon!

I always thought I would be coming to India some time later in life but was persuaded by a friend of mine to visit this country so I decided why not. Ended up spending a whole two months traveling across India.

NEPAL

Comming Soon!

Before leaving New Zealand I have to visit my mate here in Nepal and I ended up also doing the Annapurna Circuit Trek. Good fun, crazy and hectic.

SOUTH KOREA

Comming Soon!

Continuing my travels with a stop in South Korea for a week. A bit more relaxed time here after Japan but still amazing.

JAPAN

Comming Soon!

Another country I have always wanted to visit finally checked off the list. It was short time here but packed with amazing experiences and adventures.

AUSTRALIA

Comming Soon!

After leaving New Zealand I spend one month traveling the east coast in Australia a country I had always wanted to visit. Lots of wildlife, spectacular nature and good fun.

NEW ZEALAND

Comming Soon!

The long year and a half in one of the most beautiful countries in the world. I had the best experiences here and met a lot of amazing people. To sustain my travel here I was doing all kinds of odd jobs throughout my stay here.

VIETNAM

Comming Soon!

Incredible three week journey across Vietnam that started in Saigon and finished in Hanoi. I was bussing this time around but was left thirsty to do a full on motorcycle trip when coming back here.

ICELAND

Comming Soon!

The first country I went to after leaving home. Spent here 5 months and loved every bit of it.
